nodes.text: The Stalgasin Hive Guard was a military unit of the Stalgasin hive and Confederacy of Independent Systems. It was located on Geonosis and utilized Nantex-class territorial defense starfighters and Vulture-class droid starfighters. At least one starfighter participated in combat in the atmosphere of Geonosis, and Berwer Kret served as a captain within the unit.
